00021 package org.bn;
00022 
00111 import org.bn.coders.*;
00112 import org.bn.coders.ber.*;
00113 import org.bn.coders.der.*;
00114 import org.bn.coders.per.*;
00115 
00119 public class CoderFactory {
00120     private static CoderFactory instance = new CoderFactory();
00121     
00126     public static CoderFactory getInstance() {
00127         return instance;
00128     }
00129 
00134     public <T> IEncoder<T> newEncoder() throws Exception {
00135         return newEncoder("BER");
00136     }
00137 
00144     public <T> IEncoder<T> newEncoder(String encodingSchema) throws Exception {
00145         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("BER")) {
00146             return new BEREncoder<T>();
00147         }
00148         else
00149         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Aligned")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/A")) {
00150             return new PERAlignedEncoder<T>();
00151         }        
00152         else
00153         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Unaligned")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/U")) {
00154             return new PERUnalignedEncoder<T>();
00155         }        
00156         else        
00157         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("DER")) {
00158             return new DEREncoder<T>();
00159         }        
00160         else                
00161             return null;
00162     }
00163 
00169     public IDecoder newDecoder() throws Exception {
00170         return newDecoder("BER");
00171     }
00172 
00179     public IDecoder newDecoder(String encodingSchema) throws Exception {
00180         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("BER")) {
00181             return new BERDecoder();
00182         }
00183         else
00184         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Aligned")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/A")) {
00185             return new PERAlignedDecoder();
00186         }        
00187         else
00188         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Unaligned")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/U")) {
00189             return new PERUnalignedDecoder();
00190         }        
00191         else
00192         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("DER")) {
00193             return new DERDecoder();
00194         }
00195         else        
00196             return null;
00197     }
00198     
00199     public IASN1PreparedElementData newPreparedElementData(Class<?> typeInfo) {
00200         return new ASN1PreparedElementData(typeInfo);
00201     }
00202     
00203 }
